string.value: According to #p2032001#, #p1103000# recently moved to #m240000000#. I better head down to #b#m240000000##k and ask #b#p2081000##k about #p1103000#.

According to #p2081000#, #p1103000# went to visit the #bDragon Outcast#k outside town. Apparently, the scale of the Dragon Outcast is similar to #t4001207#'s... I better go visit Dragon Outcast. His house is #bconnected to #m240020401# or #m240020101##k.

When I asked #p2081012#, the Dragon Outcast, about #p1103000#, he seemed perturbed by my question and got mad at me for it. Apparently, #t4001207# is not his. He thought it might have to do instead with the stolen dragon egg incident at #m240000000#...

Hmm...? #p1103000#? Of course I remember. Aren't you talking about the Knight that planned on investigating #t4001207#? He seemed very much a proper gentleman who fits the bill of a knight. Do you want to know where he went?

When I told #p1103000# the #t4001207#s he showed me were similar to that of #bthe Dragon Outcasts#k, he took off in hopes of finding the Dragon Outcasts. The house of the Dragon Outcasts can only be accessed through #b#m240020401# or #m240020101#, so be careful#k.

Afterwards, I was never able to see #p1103000# again. I wonder if he was captured by the Dragon Outcasts. Recently, there have been reports of #rtheft on the dragon's eggs#k... Hopefully he's not involved in that.
Hmmm... I wonder what you're really looking for. Maybe my hearing has failed me, but... I don't know if your answer means yes or no.
Who are you? Who told you you're welcome here? Don't be barging in on someone else's important research!\r\n#b#L0#Hi, did #p1103000# stop by anytime recently?#k
#p1103000#? That blonde knight? Don't tell me you're one of them, too. Ahhh screw it. Screw it!!!

#t4001207# is trying to tell me something, but I have no idea what it's saying. I #bhate being in strange, dangerous areas, so I stay in this forest at all times. How are my scales supposedly out there being passed around?#k Are you looking down on me because I'm a Halfling?

Seriously, that old man Tatamo! I can see why he wouldn't like me, but that doesn't give him a right to make baseless assumptions! He should spend that time #rlooking for #o9001010#, the person responsible for stealing an egg#k...
#p2081012#'s house is somehow connected in between #b#m240020101# and #m240020401##k...
